Detailed Description

This is the main class for Handling irc sessions and channels in XVIRC.

This class is a global singleton, you cannot directly build this class. If you need to deal with you have to call wxLIRCCSessionManager::Get() to access the global instance of this manager.

Author:
foldink (foldink@gmail.com)
Date:
07-February-2010
Version:
0.0.1

static void wxLIRCCSessionManager::Free (  )  [inline, static]

This method is used to free the global instance of this class you shall never call this method unless you are a XVIRC developer and that you know what you are doing. This method will free all the memory for this class and set the global instance to 0;

Definition at line 75 of file sessionmanager.h.

static wxLIRCCSessionManager* wxLIRCCSessionManager::Get (  )  [inline, static]

This method is used to access the global instance of this class it will build it if it has not been yet... Any way you have to call this method if you want to access global informations contained in this manager.
